Snort::Stop (  ) 

Stops module process(es).

Tries PROC_STAT_TIMEOUT times.

Returns:
boolean TRUE if the process killed successfully
Todo:
Actually should stop retrying on some error conditions?

Snort::IsInstanceRunning ( $  if  )
